attributes.action: Better post 19 provision for students with Severe learning difficulties in N.I
attributes.background: At age 19 students with Severe learning difficulties have limited options at present . It comes down to the area you live in . Northern Ireland needs 19-25 provision like they are currently researching and trying to set up in England .

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Northern Ireland Assembly is responsible for. 

If you'd like to send your petition to the Northern Ireland Assembly, you can find the contact details here:

http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/about-the-assembly/contact-us/
